import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {CartService} from "../cart.service"; import {CartItem} from "../models/cart-item"; // @ts-ignore import Array from "$GLOBAL$"; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'] }) export class CartComponent implements OnInit{ products : Array; constructor( private cartService : CartService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.products = this.cartService.getItems(); } }
